think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the 'bgwriter_delay' knob in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine if it has a natural order with numerical values. 3. Check if it has any special values such as -1 or 0 that change its function significantly. 4. Conclude whether it behaves like a regular numerical knob or if it qualifies as a special knob based on the presence of these values.
